title: Workload Distribution
content: Uneven workload degrades team performance. Overloaded members make errors; underloaded members disengage. Effective teams monitor workload and rebalance dynamically. This requires both awareness of others' state and willingness to shift work.

mcq.question: You notice a teammate is overwhelmed while your workload is manageable. What should you do?

options.B: Offer to take on some of their tasks
options.C: Wait for them to ask for help

mcq.explanation: Proactive load balancing is a team behavior. Don't wait to be asked. Offer specific help: 'I can take the monitoring task if that helps.' Teams that balance load outperform those that don't.

openQuestions: How does your team monitor and balance workload?
What prevents workload from being shared in your team?
